= ").concat(n)}},{key:"registerListener",value:function(e,t,r,i){var o=this;if(r.includes("away")){var s=function(a){n(this,o),e.contains(a.target)||e.offsetWidth<1&&e.offsetHeight<1||(this.runListenerHandler(i,a),r.includes("once")&&document.removeEventListener(t,s))}.bind(this);document.addEventListener(t,s)}else{var a=r.includes("window")?window:r.includes("document")?document:e,u=function(e){var s=this;n(this,o);var c=r.filter(function(e){return n(this,s),"window"!==e}.bind(this)).filter(function(e){return n(this,s),c.includes(e)}.bind(this));if(l.length>0&&0===l.filter(function(t){return n(this,s),"cmd"!==t&&"super"!==t||(t="meta"),e["".concat(t,"Key")]}.bind(this)).length)return}r.includes("prevent")&&e.preventDefault(),r.includes("stop")&&e.stopPropagation(),this.runListenerHandler(i,e),r.includes("once")&&a.removeEventListener(t,u)}.bind(this);a.addEventListener(t,u)}}},{key:"runListenerHandler",value:function(e,t){this.evaluateCommandExpression(e,{$event:t})}},{key:"evaluateReturnExpression",value:function(e){return r=this;"template"!==e.nodeName.toLowerCase()&&console.warn("Alpine: [x-if] directive should only be added to <template> tags.");var o=document.importNode(e.content,!0);e.parentElement.insertBefore(o,e.nextElementSibling),e.nextElementSibling.__x_inserted_me=!0,p(e.nextElementSibling,function(){n(this,r)}.bind(this))}else!t&&i&&m(e.nextElementSibling,function(){n(this,r),e.nextElementSibling.remove()}.bind(this))}},{key:"updateAttributeValue",value:function(t,r,i){var o=this;if("value"===r)if("radio"===t.type)t.checked=t.value==i;else if("checkbox"===t.type)if(Array.isArray(i)){var s=!1;i.forEach(function(e){n(this,o),e==t.value&&(s=!0)}.bind(this)),t.checked=s}else t.checked=!!i;else"SELECT"===t.tagName?this.updateSelect(t,i):t.value=i;else r=this;n(this,o),i[e]?e.split(" ").forEach(function(e){return n(this,r),t.classList.add(e)}.bind(this)):e.split(" ").forEach(function(e){return n(this,r),t.classList.remove(e)}.bind(this))}.bind(this));else{var c=t.__originalClasses||[],l=i.split(" ");t.setAttribute("class",a(c.concat(l)).join(" "))}else["disabled","readonly","required","checked","hidden"].includes(r)?i?t.setAttribute(r,""):t.removeAttribute(r):t.setAttribute(r,i)}},{key:"updateSelect",value:function(e,t){var r=this,i=[].concat(t).map(function(e){return n(this,r),e+""}.bind(this));Array.from(e.options).forEach(function(e){n(this,r),e.selected=i.includes(e.value||e.text)}.bind(this))}},{key:"getRefsProxy",value:function(){var e=this;return new e(){var t=this;return regeneratorRuntime.wrap((function(e){for(;;)switch(e.prev=e.next){case 0:if(u()){e.next=3;break}return e.next=3,s();case 3:this.discoverComponents(function(e){n(this,t),this.initializeComponent(e)}.bind(this)),document.addEventListener("turbolinks:load",function(){var 6:case"end":return e.stop()}}),e,this)})),g=function(){var e=this,r=arguments;return new Promise((function(n,i){var o=b.apply(e,r);function s(e){t(o,n,i,s,a,"next",e)}function a(e){t(o,n,i,s,a,"throw",e)}s(void 0)}))},function(){return g.apply(this,arguments)}),discoverComponents:function(e){var o=0;o<r.length;o++)r[o].addedNodes.length>0&&r[o].addedNodes.forEach(function(t){n(this,i),1===t.nodeType&&t.matches("[x-data]")&&e(t)}.bind(this))}.bind(this)).observe(r,{childList:!0,attributes:!0,subtree:!0})},initializeComponent:function(e){e.__x=new
